name: New Jerusalem Bible - Roman Catholic Bible
description: New Jerusalem Bible - Roman Catholic Bible  This is one of the leading and most read translations of the Bible. New Jerusalem Bible also comes with other bible study tools to make your reading experience amazing. The New Jerusalem Bible App also comes with a list of most popular prayers for your reference.   New Jerusalem Catholic Bible is your daily scripture reading companion - With the complete holy scriptures and your prayer guide. Holy Bible comes with both the new testament and the old testaments of the holy scriptures. Catholic Bible is completely an offline bible without requiring internet connection to study the scriptures.   KEY FEATURES; Easy to read bible reader Offline bible  Share your favorite bible verse with your friends.  Daily Christian Prayers reference.  Easy to use Bible App Favorites and Bookmarks for your favorite bible verses.  Advance Bible search. Bible in the language that you will understand.  Gods word in its original form. Bible comes with a complementary English version of the holy scripture. Cross reference bible with the complementary bible version.
